channel.title: Resolus | Economy | Bosses | Slow Xp | Focused on fun & involved staff
channel.description:
[ul][CENTER][IMG]http://resolus.org/forums/images/forumcamp/logo.png[/img]
[URL=http://www.resolus.org][SIZE=5][Website][/SIZE][/URL] [URL=http://https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43192678/Resolus.jar][SIZE=5][Download][/SIZE][/URL]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]Resolus is focused on giving each and every player a great experience when playing. Resolus strives for a strong community to have fun and partake in fun adventures to reach the top! There a many things to do in Resolus and more and more is coming each and every day! There will always be something new to do and Resolus plans to keep it that way. The server already includes great content to experience, such as:[/center]
[*]Bossing: Plenty of bosses to battle off with! Including Avatar of Destruction! Try getting your hands on one of the monsters rares! [*]Training: Tons of monsters to train off and gain wealth while getting XP! [*]Minigames: Sick of training? Try out all 6 minigames including - Barrows, Fight Caves, Fight Pits, Duel Arena, Pest Control, and even Castle Wars! [*]PKing: Tons of locations to battle people off and find out who's the best player killer! Not interested in losing your items? Then check out FunPK! [*]Economy: Our economy is great because items won't just be handed out or dropped instantly by bosses. We don't want every player to be done with the game within a week, so there are many challenges along the way of mastering Resolus! The XP is fast, but not too fast. The drop rates are fair and we hope the player will always have something to do.[/ul]
Resolus is very open to criticism and suggestions! If you have any please post on our website! [/FONT] [spoiler=Media][IMG]http://img.prntscr.com/img?url=http://i.imgur.com/UrOmhSB.png[/img] [img]http://img.prntscr.com/img?url=http://i.imgur.com/0a34Qas.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZN3xarH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WmEERFE.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PjvXTla.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Icf0ghQ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Wrl1sVO.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pYI8vBj.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FfIWrQf.png[/img][/spoiler]
[spoiler=Features] [CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CLXwWWa.png[/img] [B]Notable Features[/B]
All Minigames Tons of training locations including good drops to get you started. Helpful interfaces to get you a Customizeable client All 21 Skills working. Summoning as well. 10 bosses and still adding tons more! Clean easy teleport interface Customizable Completionist Cape Interface Custom Login and Loading Screens Small Cache
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CLXwWWa.png[/img] [B]Skills[/B] Strength/Attack/Defence/Hitpoints Magic - All working spells Range - All working weapons/darts/bolts/etc. Prayer - All bones (buryable and altarable) RuneCrafting - Abyss (all runes supported) Crafting - All enchanting, All ring/necklace/amulet making, all hide tanning with snakeskins! Fletching - All bows fletchable, Stringing supported, Arrow making, Dart Making, Bolt Making Herblore - All potions making supported, including overloads! Thieving - Stalls in ardouge and pickpocketing Slayer - Custom slayer interface and shop. Duo Slayer* Hunter - All working imps with jarring Mining - All ore's supported including essence. Inferno Adze* Smithing - Complete Smithing interfaces, bar making, weapon and armour making Fishing - All fishing with rocktails Firemaking - Bonfires Woodcutting - All trees except Evergreens. Inferno Adze* Farming - All seeds supported with herb patches Summoning - All summoning pets with pouch infusing
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CLXwWWa.png[/img] [B]Minigames[/B] Duel Arena - Working stakes and item restricting/prayer,potion,etc. -restricting. Respawn after death in duel arena area Pest Control - Working portals/interfaces and npc's with point -gaining. Boat Timer Fight Caves - 63 Waves, Jad, Fire cape reward Fight Pits - Working timer and heat vent, you wont lose items upon death. - Victor is set in interface upon next round Castle wars - Working flag capturing and underground tunneling. Compete to gain tickets Barrows - shows amount of brothers that you have killed (turns names red). -Rewards inside chest
And lots more for you to find out! Hope to see you ingame! [/spoiler]

anyways I lost interest with this :l

if anyone wants it they can have it![/quote]shoot a pm with links, just to add to the collection

item.title: Resolus | Economy | Bosses | Slow Xp | Focused on fun & involved staff
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Soulcist:

I haven’t been paying much attention but I didn’t know you were still doing RSPS’. Anyway, the server looks alright, as you may know, I am very skeptical on these things. Either or, I wish for the best of luck and those forums look awesome.

Yeah, it’s been about 2 years since I have done anything with rsps. Thought I had some extra money and time and thought I would have some fun. Also I have been into theme designing for a bit now so yeah I’m glad you like the forums!

Would love to see you ingame some time old friend!

Read full topic
item.source: Resolus | Economy | Bosses | Slow Xp | Focused on fun & involved staff

item.title: Resolus | Economy | Bosses | Slow Xp | Focused on fun & involved staff
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[ul][CENTER]

[URL=http://www.resolus.org][SIZE=5][Website][/SIZE][/URL]
[URL=http://https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43192678/Resolus.jar][SIZE=5][Download][/SIZE][/URL]

[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]Resolus is focused on giving each and every player a great experience when playing. Resolus strives for a strong community to have fun and partake in fun adventures to reach the top! There a many things to do in Resolus and more and more is coming each and every day! There will always be something new to do and Resolus plans to keep it that way. The server already includes great content to experience, such as:[/center]

[]Bossing: Plenty of bosses to battle off with! Including Avatar of Destruction! Try getting your hands on one of the monsters rares!
[]Training: Tons of monsters to train off and gain wealth while getting XP!
[]Minigames: Sick of training? Try out all 6 minigames including - Barrows, Fight Caves, Fight Pits, Duel Arena, Pest Control, and even Castle Wars!
[]PKing: Tons of locations to battle people off and find out who’s the best player killer! Not interested in losing your items? Then check out FunPK!
[*]Economy: Our economy is great because items won’t just be handed out or dropped instantly by bosses. We don’t want every player to be done with the game within a week, so there are many challenges along the way of mastering Resolus! The XP is fast, but not too fast. The drop rates are fair and we hope the player will always have something to do.[/ul]

Resolus is very open to criticism and suggestions! If you have any please post on our website! [/FONT]
[spoiler=Media]

[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Features]
[CENTER] [B]Notable Features[/B]

All Minigames
Tons of training locations including good drops to get you started.
Helpful interfaces to get you a
Customizeable client
All 21 Skills working. Summoning as well.
10 bosses and still adding tons more!
Clean easy teleport interface
Customizable Completionist Cape Interface
Custom Login and Loading Screens
Small Cache

[B]Skills[/B]
Strength/Attack/Defence/Hitpoints
Magic - All working spells
Range - All working weapons/darts/bolts/etc.
Prayer - All bones (buryable and altarable)
RuneCrafting - Abyss (all runes supported)
Crafting - All enchanting, All ring/necklace/amulet making, all hide tanning
with snakeskins!
Fletching - All bows fletchable, Stringing supported, Arrow making, Dart Making, Bolt Making
Herblore - All potions making supported, including overloads!
Thieving - Stalls in ardouge and pickpocketing
Slayer - Custom slayer interface and shop. Duo Slayer*
Hunter - All working imps with jarring
Mining - All ore’s supported including essence. Inferno Adze*
Smithing - Complete Smithing interfaces, bar making, weapon and armour making
Fishing - All fishing with rocktails
Firemaking - Bonfires
Woodcutting - All trees except Evergreens. Inferno Adze*
Farming - All seeds supported with herb patches
Summoning - All summoning pets with pouch infusing

[B]Minigames[/B]
Duel Arena - Working stakes and item restricting/prayer,potion,etc.
-restricting. Respawn after death in duel arena area
Pest Control - Working portals/interfaces and npc’s with point
-gaining. Boat Timer
Fight Caves - 63 Waves, Jad, Fire cape reward
Fight Pits - Working timer and heat vent, you wont lose items upon death.

  • Victor is set in interface upon next round
    Castle wars - Working flag capturing and underground tunneling. Compete to gain tickets
    Barrows - shows amount of brothers that you have killed (turns names red).
    -Rewards inside chest

And lots more for you to find out! Hope to see you ingame!
[/spoiler]

Read full topic
